sudo.description: Advanced mod management tools for experienced users.

whatsNew.title: What's New

features: ğŸ› ï¸ Developer mode toggle with dedicated developer tools page for mod creators
ğŸ”Œ Comprehensive plugin system - Background customization, Discord Rich Presence, Flashbang (scheduled light mode), Themes (including Nightshift), and Sudo (mod conflict detection)

ğŸ“¥ Overhauled download system for better performance and reliability

ğŸ“¦ Mods no longer removed from addons folder in vanilla mode
